comments.comments_text: Fabian Delph sends a superb cross into the box. Ilkay Gundogan (Manchester City) latches on to it and from close range plants a header inside the left post, leaving Guaita beaten. He displayed his eye for goal there - excellent finish. The score is 1:0.

comments.comments_text: Absolutely fantastic goal! Andros Townsend (Crystal Palace) hits a perfect volley from far out and the ball flies into the top right corner. Take a bow.
